month\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is calculated based on the salary rate set in USD in the Compensation tool month. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The salary will be paid less applicable taxes and charges until the 10th day of each month for the previous month to the bank account specified by you, opened in one of the following banks: Halyk Bank of Kazakhstan or Kaspi Bank. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your pay slip will be sent to your work email address before your salary is may refer
